humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there is metastatic carcinoma in 1 out of 2 lymph nodes in sentinel node #4 (E). No other lymph nodes were found to have metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, based on the AJCC staging system and the new rules provided, the pathologic N stage for this patient's cancer is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has 25 lymph nodes examined, with 1 lymph node involved (malignant focus is 0.4 cm in greatest dimension). This corresponds to pN1a.
